datasetContactAffiliation.value: University of California, Los Angeles. Social Science Data Archive

dsDescriptionValue.value: Similar to the NORC Occupational Prestige Study of 1964. Covers occupation and industry of respondent, spouse, parents; occupation and industry, prestige scores, social class, educational attainment, income, religion, and basic demographic details.

topicClassValue.value: Occupational, Geographic and Social Stratification and Mobility
